Description: This template will create the required network environment for CyberArk PAS products. **WARNING** You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template

PASVPCCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PAS VPC
PASVPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PrimaryVaultSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the Primary Vault subnet.
PrimaryVaultSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

DRVaultSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the DR Vault subnet.
DRVaultSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

CPMMainSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the CPM Main subnet
CPMMainSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

CPMDRSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the CPM DR subnet
CPMDRSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PVWAMainSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PVWA Main subnet
PVWAMainSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PVWASecondarySubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PVWA Secondary subnet
PVWASecondarySubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PSMMainSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PSM Main subnet
PSMMainSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PSMSecondarySubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PSM Secondary subnet
PSMSecondarySubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PSMSSHMainSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PSM-SSH Main subnet
PSMSSHMainSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PSMSSHSecondarySubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PSM-SSH Secondary subnet
PSMSSHSecondarySubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PTAMainSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PTA Main subnet
PTAMainSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

PTADRSubnetCIDR.Description: IPv4 address range for the PTA DR subnet
PTADRSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

UsersAccessCIDR.Description: Allowed IPv4 address range for users access to CyberArk components
UsersAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

AdministrativeAccessCIDR.Description: Allowed IPv4 address range for Remote Desktop administrative access to CyberArk instances
AdministrativeAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
